Structs/NetworkMocker.html#/s:11FWFramew.name: mode

Classes/BarrageCell.html#/c:@M@FWFramewo.abstract: 设置好数据之后调用一下自动计算bounds

Classes/BarrageDescriptor.html#/s:11FWFr.name: cellTouchedAction

Classes/BarrageDescriptor.html#/s:11FWFr.name: renderRange

Classes/ImagePreviewTransitionAnimator.h.abstract: 动画开始前的准备工作可以在这里做

Classes/ImagePreviewTransitionAnimator.h.name: animationBlock
Classes/ImagePreviewTransitionAnimator.h.abstract: 转场时的实际动画内容，整个 block 会在一个 UIView animation block 里被调用，因此直接写动画内容即可，无需包裹一个 animation block

Classes/ImagePreviewTransitionAnimator.h.name: animationCompletionBlock
Classes/ImagePreviewTransitionAnimator.h.abstract: 动画结束后的事情，在执行完这个 block 后才会调用 [transitionContext completeTransition:]

Classes/ImagePreviewTransitionAnimator.h.name: animationCallbackBlock
Classes/ImagePreviewTransitionAnimator.h.abstract: 动画回调句柄，动画开始和结束时调用

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: backgroundColor
Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.abstract: 图片背后的黑色背景，默认为黑色

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: transitioningAnimator
Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.abstract: 以 present 方式进入大图预览的时候使用的转场动画 animator，可通过 ImagePreviewTransitionAnimator 提供的若干个 block 属性自定义动画，也可以完全重写一个自己的 animator。

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: presentingStyle
Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.abstract: present 时的动画，默认为 fade，当修改了 presentingStyle 时会自动把 dismissingStyle 也修改为相同的值。

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: dismissingStyle
Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.abstract: dismiss 时的动画，默认为 fade，默认与 presentingStyle 的值相同，若需要与之不同，请在设置完 presentingStyle 之后再设置 dismissingStyle。

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: sourceImageView
Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.abstract: 当以 zoom 动画进入/退出大图预览时，会通过这个 block 获取到原本界面上的图片所在的 view，从而进行动画的位置计算，如果返回的值为 nil，则会强制使用 fade 动画。当同时存在 sourceImageView 和 sourceImageRect 时，只有 sourceImageRect 会被调用。支持UIView|NSValue.CGRect类型

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: sourceImageRect
Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.abstract: 当以 zoom 动画进入/退出大图预览时，会通过这个 block 获取到原本界面上的图片所在的 view，从而进行动画的位置计算，如果返回的值为 CGRectZero，则会强制使用 fade 动画。注意返回值要进行坐标系转换。当同时存在 sourceImageView 和 sourceImageRect 时，只有 sourceImageRect 会被调用。

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: sourceImageCornerRadius
Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.abstract: 当以 zoom 动画进入/退出大图预览时，可以指定一个圆角值，默认为 -1(小于0即可)，也即自动从 sourceImageView.layer.cornerRadius 获取，如果使用的是 sourceImageRect 或希望自定义圆角值，则直接给 sourceImageCornerRadius 赋值即可。

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: dismissingScaleEnabled
Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.abstract: 手势拖拽退出预览模式时是否启用缩放效果，默认YES。仅对以 present 方式进入大图预览的场景有效。

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: dismissingGestureEnabled
Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.abstract: 是否支持手势拖拽退出预览模式，默认为 YES。仅对以 present 方式进入大图预览的场景有效。

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: dismissingWhenTappedImage

Classes/ImagePreviewController.html#/s:1.name: dismissingWhenTappedVideo

Classes/WebView.html#/s:11FWFramework7We.name: isFirstLoad
Classes/WebView.html#/s:11FWFramework7We.abstract: 是否是第一次加载，第一次加载成功及以前都为true

Classes/WebView.html#/s:11FWFramework7We.name: reusePreloadUrlBlock

Classes/WebView.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.name: reusableViewWillReuse()
Classes/WebView.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.abstract: 即将重用视图，默认重用次数+1，必须调用super

Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.name: autoDetected
Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.abstract: 是否自动检测滚动视图，默认true。如需手工指定，请禁用之

Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.name: instantBegan
Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.abstract: 是否按下就立即转换Began状态，默认false，需要等待移动才会触发Began

Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.name: scrollView
Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.abstract: 指定滚动视图，自动处理与滚动视图pan手势在指定方向的冲突。自动设置默认delegate为自身

Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.name: direction
Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.abstract: 指定与滚动视图pan手势的冲突交互方向，默认向下

Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.name: maximumDistance
Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.abstract: 指定当前手势在指定交互方向的最大识别距离，默认0，无限制

Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.name: shouldFailed
Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.abstract: 自定义Failed判断句柄。默认判定失败时直接修改状态为Failed，可设置此block修改判定条件

Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.name: swipePercent
Classes/PanGestureRecognizer.html#/s:11F.abstract: 获取当前手势在指定交互方向的滑动进度

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: dimmingClick
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 是否可以点击暗色背景关闭，默认true。如果弹出视图占满容器，手势不生效(因为弹出视图挡住了暗色背景)，也可开启弹出视图isPenetrable让手势强制生效

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: dimmingAnimated
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 是否执行暗黑背景透明度动画，默认true

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: dimmingColor
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 暗色背景颜色，默认黑色，透明度0.5

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: dismissAnimated
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 设置点击暗色背景关闭时是否执行动画，默认true

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: dismissCompletion
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 设置点击暗色背景关闭完成回调(非交互才会触发)，默认nil

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: rectCorner
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 设置弹出视图的圆角位置，默认左上和右上。如果弹出视图占满容器，不生效需弹出视图自定义

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: cornerRadius
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 设置弹出视图的圆角半径，默认0无圆角。如果弹出视图占满容器，不生效需弹出视图自定义

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: frameBlock
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 自定义弹出视图的frame计算block，默认nil占满容器，优先级高

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: presentedFrame
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 设置弹出视图的frame，默认CGRectZero占满容器，优先级中

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: presentedSize
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 设置弹出视图的居中size，默认CGSizeZero占满容器，优先级中

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: verticalInset
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 设置弹出视图的顶部距离，默认0占满容器，优先级低

Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.name: horizontalInset
Classes/PresentationController.html#/s:1.abstract: 设置弹出视图的横向距离，默认0占满容器，优先级低

Classes/TransformAnimatedTransition.html.name: init(inTransform:outTransform:)
Classes/TransformAnimatedTransition.html.abstract: 创建形变转场，指定进入(push|present)和消失(pop|dismiss)形变

Classes/SwipeAnimatedTransition.html#/s:.abstract: 创建滑动转场，指定进入(push|present)和消失(pop|dismiss)方向

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: system

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: transitionBlock
Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.abstract: 设置动画句柄

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: transitionDuration
Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.abstract: 动画持续时间，必须大于0，默认0.35秒(默认设置completionSpeed为0.35)

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: transitionType
Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.abstract: 获取动画类型，默认根据上下文判断

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: init(block:)
Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.abstract: 创建动画句柄转场

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: interactEnabled
Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.abstract: 是否启用交互pan手势进行pop|dismiss，默认false。可使用父类属性设置交互动画

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: interactDirection
Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.abstract: 指定与滚动视图pan手势的冲突交互方向，默认向下

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: isInteracting
Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.abstract: 是否正在交互中，手势开始才会标记为YES，手势结束标记为NO

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: isInteractDismissing
Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.abstract: 是否正在以交互方式dismiss|pop，需开启交互pan手势或screenEdge手势

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: interactBlock

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: interactDismissCompletion
Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.abstract: 自定义交互时dismiss关闭动画完成回调(仅交互才会触发)，默认nil

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: screenEdgeGestureRecognizer

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: interact(with:)

Classes/AnimatedTransition.html#/s:11FWF.name: presentationEnabled

Classes/MarqueeLabel.html#/c:@M@FWFramew.abstract: 在文字滚动到左右边缘时，是否要显示一个阴影渐变遮罩，默认为 NO。

Classes/MarqueeLabel.html#/c:@M@FWFramew.name: textStartAfterFade
Classes/MarqueeLabel.html#/c:@M@FWFramew.abstract: YES 表示文字会在打开 shouldFadeAtEdge 的情况下，从左边的渐隐区域之后显示，NO 表示不管有没有打开 shouldFadeAtEdge，都会从 label 的边缘开始显示。默认为 NO。

Classes/MarqueeLabel.html#/s:11FWFramewo.name: requestToStartAnimation()
Classes/MarqueeLabel.html#/s:11FWFramewo.abstract: 如果在可复用的 UIView 里使用（例如 UITableViewCell、UICollectionViewCell），由于 UIView 可能重复被使用，因此需要在某些显示/隐藏的时机去手动开启/关闭 label 的动画。如果在普通的 UIView 里使用则无需关注这一部分的代码。

Classes/MarqueeLabel.html#/s:11FWFramewo.name: requestToStopAnimation()
Classes/MarqueeLabel.html#/s:11FWFramewo.abstract: 尝试停止 label 的滚动动画

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:11FWFramewo.name: init(colors:locations:startPoint:endPoint:)
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:11FWFramewo.abstract: 初始化并指定渐变颜色、位置和渐变方向

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:11FWFramewo.name: setColors(_:locations:startPoint:endPoint:)
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:11FWFramewo.abstract: 设置渐变颜色、位置和渐变方向

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: delegate
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 事件代理，默认nil

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: direction
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 拖拽方向，如向上拖动视图时为Up，向下为Down，向右为Right，向左为Left。默认向上

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: positions
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 抽屉位置，至少两级，相对于view父视图的originY位置，自动从小到大排序

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: kickbackHeight
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 回弹高度，拖拽小于该高度执行回弹，默认为0

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: enabled
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 是否启用拖拽，默认YES。其实就是设置手势的enabled

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: autoDetected
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 是否自动检测滚动视图，默认YES。如需手工指定，请禁用之

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: scrollView
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 指定滚动视图，自动处理与滚动视图pan手势在指定方向的冲突。先尝试设置delegate为自身，尝试失败请手工调用scrollViewDidScroll

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: view
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 抽屉视图，自动添加pan手势

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: gestureRecognizer
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 抽屉拖拽手势，默认设置delegate为自身

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: position
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 抽屉视图当前位置

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: openPosition
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 抽屉视图打开位置

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: middlePosition
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 抽屉视图中间位置，建议单数时调用

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: closePosition
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 抽屉视图关闭位置

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: positionChanged
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 抽屉视图位移回调，参数为相对view父视图的origin位置和是否拖拽完成的标记

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: animationBlock
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 自定义动画句柄，动画必须调用animations和completion句柄

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: scrollViewFilter
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 滚动视图过滤器，默认只处理可滚动视图的冲突。如需其它条件，可自定义此句柄

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 自定义滚动视图允许滚动的位置，默认nil时仅openPosition可滚动

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 自定义滚动视图在各个位置的contentInset(从小到大，数量同positions)，默认nil时不处理。UITableView时也可使用tableFooterView等实现

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: init(view:)
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 创建抽屉拖拽视图，view会强引用之。view为滚动视图时，详见scrollView属性

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: position(at:)
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 获取抽屉视图指定索引位置(从小到大)，获取失败返回0

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: isPosition(at:)
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 判断当前抽屉效果视图是否在指定索引位置(从小到大)

Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.name: setPosition(at:animated:)
Classes/DrawerView.html#/s:11FWFramework.abstract: 设置抽屉效果视图到指定索引位置(从小到大)，如果位置发生改变，会触发抽屉callback回调

Classes/DrawerView.html#/c:@M@FWFramewor.name: scrollViewDidScroll(_:)
Classes/DrawerView.html#/c:@M@FWFramewor.abstract: 如果scrollView已自定义delegate，需在scrollViewDidScroll手工调用本方法

Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.abstract: 全局重写过滤器

Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.name: rewriteURL(_:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.abstract: 根据重写规则，重写URL

Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.name: addRewriteRule(_:targetRule:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.abstract: 添加重写规则

Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.name: addRewriteRules(_:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.abstract: 批量添加重写规则

Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.name: removeRewriteRule(_:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.abstract: 移除重写规则

Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.name: removeAllRewriteRules()
Classes/Router.html#/s:11FWFramework6Rou.abstract: 移除所有的重写规则

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: completionQueue
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 约定回调队列，默认main队列

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: failedError
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 约定失败错误，约定失败时默认使用，可用于错误判断，支持自定义

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: validationError
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 约定验证错误，验证失败时默认使用，可用于错误判断，支持自定义

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: timeoutError
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 约定超时错误，约定超时时默认使用，可用于错误判断，支持自定义

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: init(completion:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 指定操作完成句柄初始化

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: init(block:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 指定操作成功和失败句柄初始化

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: init(progress:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 指定操作成功、失败句柄和进度句柄初始化

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: init(value:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 快速创建成功实例

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: init(error:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 快速创建失败实例

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: all(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 全部约定，所有约定成功才返回约定结果合集；如果某一个失败了，则返回该错误信息；约定进度为所有约定总进度

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: any(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 某个约定，返回最先成功的约定结果；如果都失败了，返回最后一个错误信息；约定进度为最先成功的约定进度

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: race(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 约定竞速，返回最先结束的约定结果，不管成功或失败；约定进度为最先结束的约定进度

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: delay(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 延时约定，延时完成时必定成功

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: retry(_:delay:block:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 约定重试，block需返回新创建的约定，该约定失败时延迟指定时间后重新创建并执行，直至成功或达到最大重试次数(总次数retry+1)

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: done(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 执行约定并回调完成句柄

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: done(_:catch:finally:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 执行约定并分别回调成功、失败句柄，统一回调收尾句柄

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: done(_:catch:progress:finally:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 执行约定并分别回调成功、失败句柄、进度句柄，统一回调收尾句柄

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: then(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 执行当前约定，成功时调用句柄处理结果或者返回下一个约定

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: recover(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 执行当前约定，失败时调用句柄恢复结果或者返回下一个约定

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: validate(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 验证约定，当前约定成功时验证结果，可返回Bool或抛异常；验证通过时返回结果，验证失败时返回验证错误

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: reduce(_:reducer:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 减少约定，当前约定结果作为初始值value，顺序使用value和数组值item调用reducer，产生新的value继续循环直至结束，类似数组reduce方法

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: delay(_:force:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 约定延时，当前约定成功时延时返回结果；默认失败时不延时，可设置force强制失败时也延时

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: timeout(_:error:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 约定超时，当前约定未超时时返回结果；否则返回超时错误信息

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: retry(_:delay:block:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 约定重试，block需返回新创建的约定，当前约定失败时延迟指定时间后调用block创建约定并执行，直至成功或达到最大重试次数

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: value
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 异步获取结果值

Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.name: value()
Classes/Promise.html#/s:11FWFramework7Pr.abstract: 异步获取结果值，可声明类型

Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.name: sharedLoader
Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.abstract: 单例插件加载器，加载未注册插件时会尝试调用并注册，block返回值为register方法object参数

Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.name: registerPlugin(_:object:)
Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.abstract: 注册单例插件，仅当插件未使用时生效，插件类或对象必须实现protocol

Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.name: presetPlugin(_:object:)
Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.abstract: 预置单例插件，仅当插件未注册时生效，插件类或对象必须实现protocol

Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.name: unregisterPlugin(_:)
Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.abstract: 取消插件注册，仅当插件未使用时生效

Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.name: loadPlugin(_:)
Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.abstract: 延迟加载插件对象，调用后不可再注册该插件

Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.name: unloadPlugin(_:)
Classes/PluginManager.html#/s:11FWFramew.abstract: 释放插件对象并标记为未使用，释放后可重新注册该插件

Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.name: topNavigationController
Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.abstract: 获取最顶部的导航栏控制器。如果顶部VC不含导航栏，返回nil

Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.name: push(_:animated:)
Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.abstract: 使用最顶部的导航栏控制器打开控制器

Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.name: push(_:pop:animated:)
Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.abstract: 使用最顶部的导航栏控制器打开控制器，同时pop指定数量控制器

Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.name: present(_:animated:completion:)
Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.abstract: 使用最顶部的显示控制器弹出控制器，建议present导航栏控制器(可用来push)

Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.name: open(_:animated:options:completion:)
Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.abstract: 使用最顶部的视图控制器打开控制器，自动判断push|present

Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.name: close(animated:options:completion:)
Classes/Navigator.html#/s:11FWFramework9.abstract: 关闭最顶部的视图控制器，自动判断pop|dismiss，返回是否成功

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: main

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取当前主场景，可自定义

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: topViewController
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取最顶部的视图控制器

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: topNavigationController
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取最顶部的导航栏控制器。如果顶部VC不含导航栏，返回nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: topPresentedController
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取最顶部的显示控制器

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: open(_:animated:options:completion:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: close(animated:options:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 关闭最顶部的视图控制器，自动判断pop|dismiss，返回是否成功

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: open(_:animated:options:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开控制器。1.如果打开导航栏，则调用present；2.否则如果导航栏存在，则调用push；3.否则调用present

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: close(animated:options:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 关闭控制器，返回是否成功。1.如果导航栏不存在，则调用dismiss；2.否则如果已是导航栏底部，则调用dismiss；3.否则调用pop

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: workflowName
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义工作流名称，支持二级(“."分隔)；默认返回小写类名(去掉ViewController、Controller)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: pushViewController(_:animated:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: push新界面，完成时回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: popViewController(animated:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: pop当前界面，完成时回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: popToViewController(_:animated:completion:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: topWorkflowName
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 当前最外层工作流名称，即topViewController的工作流名称

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: push(_:popTopWorkflowAnimated:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: push控制器，并清理最外层工作流（不属于工作流则不清理）

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: push(_:popToWorkflow:animated:completion:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: popToWorkflow(_:animated:completion:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: containerBackgroundColor

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: enableBarTransition()

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用导航栏全屏返回手势，默认NO。启用时系统返回手势失效，禁用时还原系统手势。如果只禁用系统手势，设置interactivePopGestureRecognizer.enabled即可

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 判断手势是否是全局返回手势对象

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: barTransitionIdentifier

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: fullscreenPopGestureDisabled

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: contentView

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: backgroundView

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: contentView
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 工具栏内容视图，iOS11+才存在，显示item等

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: sectionConfigPrepareLayout()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 初始化布局section配置，在prepareLayout调用即可

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: sectionConfigLayoutAttributes(forElementsIn:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取布局section属性，在layoutAttributesForElementsInRect:调用并添加即可

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: drawerView
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 抽屉拖拽视图，绑定抽屉拖拽效果后才存在

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: drawerView(_:positions:kickbackHeight:positionChanged:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置抽屉拖拽效果。如果view为滚动视图，自动处理与滚动视图pan手势冲突的问题

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: drawerSuperviewFixed
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 外部滚动视图是否位于顶部固定位置，在顶部时不能滚动

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: drawerSuperviewDidScroll(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 外部滚动视图scrollViewDidScroll调用，参数为固定的位置

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: drawerSubviewDidScroll(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 内嵌滚动视图scrollViewDidScroll调用，参数为外部滚动视图

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: viewHolder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 视图持有者对象，弱引用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: reuseIdentifier
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 重用唯一标志，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: reusedTimes
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 视图已重用次数，默认0

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: reusePreparing
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 标记重用准备中(true)，准备中的视图在完成(false)之前都不会被dequeue，默认false

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: reuseInvalid
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 标记重用失效，将自动从缓存池移除

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: preloadReusableView()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 按需预加载下一个可重用视图，仅当前视图可重用时生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: tableDelegate
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 表格代理，延迟加载

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: tableView(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速创建tableView，可配置钩子句柄

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: tableViewConfiguration
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 配置创建tableView钩子句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: scrollDelegate
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 滚动事件代理，需手工设置delegate生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: textDelegate
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 输入事件代理，需手工设置delegate生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: textDelegate
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 输入事件代理，需手工设置delegate生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: searchDelegate
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 搜索栏事件代理，需手工设置delegate生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: modalTransition
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 视图控制器present|dismiss转场。注意会修改transitioningDelegate，且会强引用之；如需weak引用，请直接设置transitioningDelegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: viewTransition
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 视图控制器push|pop转场，代理导航控制器转场，需在fwNavigationTransition设置后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setPresentTransition(_:edge:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义控制器present系统转场(蒙层渐变，内容默认向上动画)，会设置fwModalTransition

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setAlertTransition(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义控制器alert缩放转场(蒙层渐变，内容缩放动画)，会设置fwModalTransition

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setFadeTransition(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义控制器fade渐变转场(蒙层和内容渐变动画)，会设置fwModalTransition;

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: presentationDidDismiss
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置iOS13默认present手势下拉dismiss时的回调block，仅iOS13生效，自动触发，手工dismiss不会触发。会自动设置presentationController.delegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setPopoverPresentation(_:shouldDismiss:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义控制器popover弹出效果(preferredContentSize设置大小)，会自动设置modalPresentationStyle和popoverPresentationController.delegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: transition(to:pinEdges:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 转场添加到指定控制器(pinEdges占满父视图)，返回父容器视图。VC.tabBarController.view > VC.navigationController.view > VC.view

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: wrappedTransitionController(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 包装到转场控制器(pinEdges占满父视图)，返回创建的控制器

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setPresentTransition(_:contentView:edge:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义视图模拟present系统转场(蒙层渐变，内容默认向上动画)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setAlertTransition(_:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义视图模拟alert缩放转场(蒙层渐变，内容缩放动画)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setFadeTransition(_:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义视图模拟fade渐变转场(蒙层和内容渐变动画)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: navigationTransition
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 导航控制器push|pop转场。注意会修改delegate，且会强引用之，一直生效直到设置为nil。如需weak引用，请直接设置delegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: reuseConfigurationBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 重用WebView全局配置句柄(第二个参数为重用标志)，为所有复用WebView提供预先的默认configuration

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: processPool
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 默认跨WKWebView共享Cookie，切换用户时可重置processPool清空Cookie

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: defaultConfiguration()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快捷创建WKWebView默认配置，自动初始化User-Agent和共享processPool

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: browserUserAgent
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取默认浏览器UserAgent，包含应用信息，示例：Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU OS 14_2 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Mobile/15E148 Safari/605.1.15 Example/1.0.0

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: extensionUserAgent
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取默认浏览器扩展UserAgent，不含平台信息，可用于applicationNameForUserAgent，示例：Mobile/15E148 Safari/605.1.15 Example/1.0.0

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: requestUserAgent
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取默认请求UserAgent，可用于网络请求，示例：Example/1.0.0 (iPhone; iOS 14.2; Scale/3.00)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: userAgent
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取当前UserAgent，未自定义时为默认，示例：Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU OS 14_2 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Mobile/15E148

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: loadRequest(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 加载网页请求，支持String|URL|URLRequest等

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: clearCache(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 清空网页缓存，完成后回调。单个网页请求指定URLRequest.cachePolicy即可

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: clearBackForwardList()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 清空WebView后退和前进的网页栈

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: evaluateScript(_:variables:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 使用JavaScriptCore执行脚本并返回结果，支持模板替换。常用语服务端下发计算公式等场景

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: jsBridge

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: jsBridgeEnabled

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自动初始化Javascript桥接器，jsBridgeEnabled开启时生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: extendedLayoutEdge

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: adjustExtendedLayout(compatible:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: touchResign
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用点击背景关闭键盘(会继续触发其它点击事件)，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardScrollView
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 指定用于键盘管理滚动的scrollView，默认为nil，通过修改VC.view.frame实现

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: returnResign
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 点击键盘完成按钮是否关闭键盘，默认NO，二选一

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: returnNext
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置点击键盘完成按钮是否自动切换下一个输入框，二选一

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: returnBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置点击键盘完成按钮的事件句柄

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardToolbar
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取关联的键盘Toolbar对象，可自定义样式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: toolbarPreviousButton
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar上一个按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认朝上的箭头

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: toolbarNextButton
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar下一个按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认朝下的箭头

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: toolbarDoneButton
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar完成按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认Done

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: previousResponder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: nextResponder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击下一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: previousResponderTag
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框tag，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: nextResponderTag
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击下一个按钮时聚焦的输入框tag，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: goPrevious()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自动跳转前一个输入框，优先使用previousResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: goNext()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自动跳转后一个输入框，优先使用nextResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardHeight(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取键盘弹出时的高度，对应Key为UIKeyboardFrameEndUserInfoKey

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardAnimate(_:animations:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 执行键盘跟随动画，支持AutoLayout，可通过keyboardHeight:获取键盘高度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addToolbar(title:doneBlock:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加Toolbar，指定标题和完成句柄，使用默认按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addToolbar(titleItem:previousItem:nextItem:doneItem:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加Toolbar，指定居中标题、左侧上一个、下一个按钮和右边按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardManager
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用键盘管理(自动滚动)，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardDistance
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置输入框和键盘的空白间距，默认10.0

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardDistanceBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置输入框和键盘的空白间距句柄，参数为键盘高度、输入框高度，优先级高，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: reboundDistance
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置输入框和键盘的回弹触发最小距离，默认0始终回弹

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardResign
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用键盘后台关闭处理，退后台时收起键盘，回到前台时恢复键盘，解决系统退后台输入框跳动问题，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: touchResign
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用点击背景关闭键盘(会继续触发其它点击事件)，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardScrollView
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 指定用于键盘管理滚动的scrollView，默认为nil，通过修改VC.view.frame实现

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: returnResign
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 点击键盘完成按钮是否关闭键盘，默认NO，二选一。此方法会修改delegate，可使用fwDelegate访问原始delegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: returnNext
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置点击键盘完成按钮是否自动切换下一个输入框，二选一。此方法会修改delegate，可使用fwDelegate访问原始delegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: returnBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置点击键盘完成按钮的事件句柄。此方法会修改delegate，可使用fwDelegate访问原始delegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: delegate
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 调用上面三个方法后会修改delegate，此方法始终访问外部delegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar下一个按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认朝下的箭头

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: toolbarDoneButton
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar完成按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认Done

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击下一个按钮时聚焦的输入框tag，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自动跳转前一个输入框，优先使用previousResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自动跳转后一个输入框，优先使用nextResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardHeight(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取键盘弹出时的高度，对应Key为UIKeyboardFrameEndUserInfoKey

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardAnimate(_:animations:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 执行键盘跟随动画，支持AutoLayout，可通过keyboardHeight:获取键盘高度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addToolbar(title:doneBlock:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加Toolbar，指定标题和完成句柄，使用默认按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addToolbar(titleItem:previousItem:nextItem:doneItem:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加Toolbar，指定居中标题、左侧上一个、下一个按钮和右边按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: placeholder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 占位文本，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: placeholderColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 占位颜色，默认系统颜色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: attributedPlaceholder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 带属性占位文本，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: placeholderInset
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义占位文本内间距，默认zero与内容一致

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: verticalAlignment
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义垂直分布方式，会自动修改contentInset，默认Top与系统一致

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: autoHeightEnabled
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用自动高度功能，随文字改变高度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: maxHeight
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 最大高度，默认CGFLOAT_MAX，启用自动高度后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: minHeight
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 最小高度，默认0，启用自动高度后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: heightDidChange
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 高度改变回调句柄，默认nil，启用自动高度后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: autoHeight(maxHeight:didChange:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快捷启用自动高度，并设置最大高度和回调句柄

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: localized
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速读取本地化语言

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: localized(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速读取本地化语言，指定Bundle

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: localized(_:_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速读取本地化语言，指定表名和Bundle

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: localizedBundle()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 根据本地化语言加载当前bundle内语言文件，支持动态切换

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: localizedBundle(language:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 加载当前bundle内指定语言文件，加载失败返回nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: availableLanguages
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取应用可用语言列表

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: languageName(for:localeIdentifier:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取指定语言显示名称，可指定本地化标识(默认当前语言)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: currentLanguage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取应用当前语言，如果localizedLanguage存在则返回，否则返回systemLanguage

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: systemLanguage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取当前系统语言，不满足需求时可自定义，兼容应用设置且不含区域，示例：zh-Hans

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: localizedLanguage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取或设置自定义本地化语言，未自定义时为空。(语言值对应本地化文件存在才会立即生效，如zh-Hans|en)，为空时清空自定义，会触发通知。默认只处理mainBundle语言，如果需要处理三方SDK和系统组件语言，详见Bundle分类

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: localizedString(_:table:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取本地化字符串，可指定table，strings文件需位于mainBundle，支持动态切换

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: bundle(name:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 加载指定名称bundle对象，bundle文件需位于mainBundle

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: bundle(with:name:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 加载指定类所在bundle对象，可指定子目录名称，一般用于Framework内bundle文件

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: localizedString(_:bundle:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取指定bundle内strings文件本地化字符串，支持动态切换

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: localizedString(_:table:bundle:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取指定bundle内strings文件本地化字符串，指定table，支持动态切换

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: executableName
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取当前bundle的可执行程序名称，一般和模块名称相同

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: commonDisplayLink(target:selector:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用target-action，自动CommonModes添加到当前的运行循环中，避免ScrollView滚动时不触发

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: commonDisplayLink(block:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用block，自动CommonModes添加到当前的运行循环中，避免ScrollView滚动时不触发

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: displayLink(block:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用block，需要调用addToRunLoop:forMode:安排到当前的运行循环中(CommonModes避免ScrollView滚动时不触发)。

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: startBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置动画开始回调，需要在add之前添加，因为add时会自动拷贝一份对象

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: stopBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置动画停止回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeBackgroundColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题背景色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeBorderColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题边框色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeShadowColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题阴影色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeContents
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题内容图片，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setShadowColor(_:offset:radius:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置阴影颜色、偏移和半径

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: removeDefaultAnimations()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 移除所有支持动画属性的默认动画，需要一个不带动画的layer时使用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: snapshotImage(size:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 生成图片截图，默认大小为frame.size

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeColors
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题渐变色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: gradientLayer(_:colors:locations:startPoint:endPoint:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建渐变层，需手工addLayer

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: drawBezierPath(_:strokeWidth:strokeColor:fillColor:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制形状路径，需要在drawRect中调用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: drawLinearGradient(_:colors:locations:direction:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制渐变颜色，需要在drawRect中调用，支持四个方向，默认向下Down

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: drawLinearGradient(_:colors:locations:startPoint:endPoint:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制渐变颜色，需要在drawRect中调用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addGradientLayer(_:colors:locations:startPoint:endPoint:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加渐变Layer

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addDashLayer(_:lineLength:lineSpacing:lineColor:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加虚线Layer

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addAnimation(block:duration:options:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加UIView动画，使用默认动画参数

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addAnimation(curve:transition:duration:animations:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加UIView动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addAnimation(keyPath:fromValue:toValue:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加CABasicAnimation动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addTransition(options:block:duration:animationsEnabled:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加转场动画，可指定animationsEnabled，一般用于window切换rootViewController

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addTransition(type:subtype:timingFunction:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加CATransition转场动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: removeAnimation(forKey:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 移除单个框架视图动画，key默认FWAnimation

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: removeAllAnimations()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 移除所有视图动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: stroke(layer:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: shake(times:delta:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 水平摇摆动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: fade(alpha:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 渐显隐动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: fade(block:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 渐变代码块动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: rotate(degree:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 旋转动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: scale(scaleX:scaleY:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 缩放动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: move(point:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 移动动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: move(frame:duration:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 移动变化动画

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: animateNone(block:completion:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(alpha:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(scaleSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 缩放图片到指定大小

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 缩放图片到指定大小，指定模式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: draw(in:contentMode:clipsToBounds:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 按指定模式绘制图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(cropRect:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 裁剪指定区域图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(insets:color:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(capInsets:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 按角度常数(0~360)转动图片，指定图片尺寸是否延伸来适应内容，否则图片尺寸不变，内容被裁剪，默认true

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(maskImage:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 生成mark图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(mergeImage:atPoint:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 图片合并，并制定叠加图片的起始位置

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(filter:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: pixellateImage(fuzzyValue:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: compressImage(maxLength:compressRatio:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: compressImage(maxWidth:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: compressImages(_:maxWidth:maxLength:compressRatio:completion:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(view:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从视图创建UIImage，生成截图，主线程调用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 保存视频到相册，保存成功时error为nil。如果视频地址为NSURL，需使用NSURL.path

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取灰度图

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(reflectScale:gap:alpha:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 宽度，frame.size.width

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 高度，frame.size.height

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: centerY

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 起始横坐标，frame.origin.x

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 大小，frame.size

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加生命周期变化监听句柄(注意deinit不能访问runtime关联属性)，返回监听者observer

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加生命周期变化监听句柄，并携带自定义参数(注意deinit不能访问runtime关联属性)，返回监听者observer

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: completionHandler

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: shouldPopController

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: enablePopProxy()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 单独启用返回代理拦截，优先级高于+enablePopProxy，启用后支持shouldPopController、allowsPopGesture功能，默认NO未启用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: enablePopProxy()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 全局启用返回代理拦截，优先级低于-enablePopProxy，启用后支持shouldPopController、allowsPopGesture功能，默认NO未启用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: childProxyEnabled
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否全局启用child状态栏样式代理，enablePopProxy时自动启用，默认false

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openAppStore(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 异步打开AppStore下载页

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 异步打开AppStore评价页

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openAppSettings()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 异步打开系统应用设置页

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openAppNotificationSettings()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 异步打开系统应用通知设置页

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openMailApp(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 异步打开系统邮件App

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openMessageApp(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 异步打开系统短信App

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openPhoneApp(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 异步打开系统电话App

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: shapeImage(_:strokeWidth:strokeColor:fillColor:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: middlePoint(_:with:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: controlPoint(_:with:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 计算两点的贝塞尔曲线控制点

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置设备token原始Data，格式化并保存

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置阴影颜色、偏移和半径

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制四边边框

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setBorderColor(_:width:cornerRadius:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 优化图片人脸显示，参考：https://github.com/croath/UIImageView-BetterFace

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: reflect()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 倒影效果

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 选中并获取指定类TabBar根视图控制器(非导航控制器)，找不到返回nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 选中并获取指定条件TabBar根视图控制器(非导航控制器)，找不到返回nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setFont(_:textColor:text:textAlignment:numberOfLines:lineHeight:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义按钮高亮时的alpha，如0.5，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义按钮禁用状态改变时的句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: preferredSize

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 最大字数限制，0为无限制，二选一

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 移动光标到最后

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 移动光标到指定位置，兼容动态text赋值

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: maxLength
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 最大字数限制，0为无限制，二选一
